game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the artifact from the ancient temple
game.description: Your task is to overcome dangers of the ancient temple and retrieve a sacred artifact that has been lost for centuries.

task.description: The temple is located deep within the Enclave Forest. Beware of treacherous beasts along your way.

task.objective: Find and defeat the ancient warriors for the artifact
task.description: The artifact is hidden in a secret chamber guarded by these warriors. Be prepared for a challenging encounter.
